changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, base.id, base.job, base.sequence_number, sc.name AS status, s.name AS service, at.name AS assign_to, r.name AS requester, p.name AS product, dt.name AS deliver_to, df.name AS deliver_from, base.quantity, u.name AS quantity_unit, base.notes, up.name AS updated_by, base.version FROM job_chronology base JOIN product s ON base.service = s.id JOIN product p ON base.product = p.id JOIN agency at ON base.assign_to = at.id JOIN agency r ON base.requester = r.id JOIN location dt ON base.deliver_to = dt.id JOIN location df ON base.deliver_from = df.id JOIN status_code sc ON base.status = sc.id JOIN agency up ON base.updated_by = up.id JOIN unit u ON base.quantity_unit = u.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.workspace_authorization wa ON base.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
